name: DragonScriber (Web)
description:
The keyboard is mightier than the sword! Slay knights with your draconic roaring powers by just spelling their names. Go kick their chivalrous derrieres!

Controls:

Space: Start the game
Letter keys: Hit enemies

NOTE: If you can not play the game because your browser does not support the Unity plugin (i.e. Google Chrome), play it in another browser (Firefox, Internet Explorer...) or download it on your desktop (Windows, Mac and Linux supported).
